meanings.definition: The quality or state of being thermolabile.
meanings.sent1: Her thermolabilities were evident when the chocolate she left in the car melted quickly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the thermolabilities of different plastics to understand their heat sensitivity.
meanings.sent3: The thermolabilities of the ice cream made it disappear in the sun before she could even take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The fragile thermolabilities of the candle wax made it drip and change shape in the warm room.
meanings.sent5: The thermolabilities of the butter made it turn into a liquid puddle on the hot toast.

meanings.definition: The susceptibility of a substance to change or degrade under the influence of heat.
meanings.sent1: The thermolabilities of the ice cream caused it to melt rapidly under the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: The packaging was designed to protect the thermolabilities of the medicine from heat damage during transport.
meanings.sent3: The thermolabilities of the chocolate bar made it a risky snack choice for the beach picnic.
meanings.sent4: The thermolabilities of the ice sculptures made them slowly disappear under the warm lights of the exhibit.
meanings.sent5: The thermolabilities of the candle wax were evident as it softened and bent in the summer heat.
